EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to your Blackpurl Trial
View this email in your browser
Hello {!User.FirstName}, thanks for signing up to Blackpurl.
We really are grateful to you and your team for giving us a try.
Check out the content below to get started.
If you have any questions feel free to reply here. We read every message and will get back to you as soon as we can.
Let's get cracking.
Login Details
Use your details to login to Blackpurl on any internet connected PC.
Username {!User.Username}
Password Soon, you'll receive an email from Salesforce, our platform partner. Simply follow the prompts to choose your password and login into Blackpurl.
Login to Blackpurl
Getting Started: tip 1
Use the CREATE button to start every transaction. Whether you're selling a part to a customer, managing a service or adding customers/vendors to Blackpurl. You'll be able to complete every transaction from this button.
Create
Getting Started: tip 2
Add anything at all to your order by simply using the search to add box. For example, just search for a part to add it to an order. Similarly, if you want to insert a service job, just select it from the drop-down Info Section menu. Nothing could be simpler.
Getting Started: tip 3
Use SEARCH to find everything you need. Whether you're searching for a customer's details, looking for a part, or need to find a vendor order, you'll find it all from the search bar at the top of every page.
Use ADVANCED SEARCH to create all of your business reports and to perform very specific searches.
Want to get up and running faster?
Life is busy. Save time and get the most out of your trial by letting us set it up and show you around.
Contact Us
Support
We're here to help. If you have any questions at all or need any help, try visiting our online community where you'll find a host of self-help articles. Alternatively just reply to this email and we'll contact you.
